comments.body: Do we understand why we are deep-copying or is it paranoia?

Intentional but needed a comment - added one now. Back in the day Jordan helped me add a cacheMutationCheck util to EndpointSlice controller tests to ensure we weren't modifying resources in informer cache. Unchanged slices are direct references to informer cache until we reach this point.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +47,51 @@				// Need to deep copy before we make any modifications to avoid
				// accidentally changing informer cache.
				slice = slice.DeepCopy()
				slice.Endpoints[i].Hints = nil
				changed = true
